product_name: Novara Purist Water Bottle - 22 fl. oz.
long_description: Our Novara Purist 22 fl. oz. water bottle delivers pure-tasting liquids at a high flow rate to satisfy your hydration needs when riding. BPA- and phthalate-free polyethylene bottle is flexible for easy squeezing and fast water delivery; bottle can be frozen and/or have ice placed inside of it. Purist treatment infuses the bottle's interior with silicon dioxide to prevent odors, stains, and mold from attaching to the inner surface, offering a pure taste. MoFlo cap is all about high-volume water delivery to quench your thirst pronto; nozzle can be removed for cleaning. Cap is also sealed with an integrated O-ring and a lock-down nozzle for leak-free transport and shaking/mixing of powdered drink mixes. Please note: interior of the Novara Purist water bottle should never be scrubbed or mechanically scratched. Recommended cleaning method is to rinse your bottle with warm water and a mild detergent; alternatively, bottle can be washed on the top rack of a dishwasher.
